version_description:
UPDATE NOW FOR MORE CARS AND NEW EVENTS! Think you can handle even more trouble? Boost your car collection and your wanted level with some brand new rides that will help you move up the Most Wanted list.

• Start some trouble in 2 brand-new cars –
Tighten your seat belts! We’ve made some behind-the-scenes improvements to keep your game running smoothly. Thanks for playing!
To be Most Wanted, you'll need to outrun the cops, outdrive your friends, and outsmart your rivals. Check out the changes we've made to improve your playing experience. Thanks for racing!
Are you ready to ride? Hit the streets with new updates designed to improve your racing experience. Thanks for playing!

We got under the hood, tuning your street racing experience for iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max and iOS 12. Thanks for playing!
We’ve just boosted performance, now supporting iPad Pro 11 and iPad Pro 12.9.Keep racing!
